questions.question: Confirm the Equipment with below provided image.
Upload the image of the equipment, contact the technical team for recorrections and scan the bar code again
confirm for any physical Damage of the Equipment.
Prepare the Incident / Damage and Missing Report.
Connect the equipment to the mains and confirm whether the equipment is getting ON
Check whether the wall outlet is provided with AC voltage of 230.
Shift the Equipment to another place where the AC voltage of 230 is provided
Check the female connector for continuity and confirm whether it is defective.
Replace the connector with a new one
Check and confirm whether the water is getting heated
Check the continuity of coil and confirm whether the coil is defective.
Replace the coil with a new one
If the problem is not yet solved, contact the Technical team for any other assistance through video call.
